metadata.name: Suspicious File Creation Activity From Fake Recycle.Bin Folder
metadata.comment: Detects file write event from/to a fake recycle bin folder that is often used as a staging directory for malware

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('recyclers.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('recycler.bin\\'))) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('recyclers.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('recycler.bin\\'))))

output.summary: Detects file write event from/to a fake recycle bin folder that is often used as a staging directory for malware
